name: Jump Frog (PulinPulinho)
description:
A game meant to be super hard with unique movement about a frog that jumps and sticks his tongue to go up.

It is not finished but the first part is ready. Please feel free to give any advice about the game.

The commands are:

/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

Jump - Spacebar

Movement -  A/D

Stick Tongue - Left click on the fences.

////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
